channel.title: google on Mike Johnson
channel.description: Recent content in google on Mike Johnson

item.title: DeepMind Health
item.description: I was involved with DeepMind Health from its very early days. As I’m under NDA, I can’t go into details here. This is a shame, as DeepMind Health has been quite successful. We produced the Streams application as well as some notable research output on the subject of computerised analysis of retinal imaging paper available here. DeepMind Health eventually became part of the new Google Health effort. My role was focused around providing infrastructure for us to start handling data in the right way for us, the NHS, and its patients.
